articles.title: Macaulay Culkin aparece por sorpresa en pasarela de Gucci
articles.description: Macaulay Culkin, actor de "Home Alone", lucía cómodo con un atuendo vibrante durante el desfile de Gucci Love Parade en Hollywood Boulevard.
articles.content:
Google revive a "Home Alone" en este comercial 1:14

articles.title: New investigation accuses CBS chief Les Moonves of sexual misconduct
articles.description: Les Moonves, the influential 68-year-old chief executive officer of CBS, has been accused of sexual misconduct from six women in a new investigation from journalist Ronan Farrow, whose articles detailing extensive sexual assault and harassment from Hollywood …
articles.content:
